Literature.Title: De novo design of selective antibiotic peptides by incorporation of unnatural amino acids.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Bhonsle JB, Venugopal D, Koser BW, Magill AJ

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides containing unnatural amino acid exhibit potent bactericidal activity against ESKAPE pathogens.

Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=25µg/ml),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=7.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=0.75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MBC=100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MBC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MIC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MBC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MBC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MIC=25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MBC=50µg/ml),Francisella tularensis SCHU-S4(MIC=250µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Ames(MIC=0.98µg/ml),Brucella melitensis 16M(MIC=>500µg/ml),Yersinia pestis C092(MIC=31.25µg/ml)
